item.title: 👍Barbara Putnam - Department of Commerce
item.description: Barbara Putnam signed up to testify Pro.

item.title: 👎Dennis D'Ambrosio - Heritage Bank
item.description: Dennis D'Ambrosio signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Heritage Bank.

item.title: 👎💵Bill Stauffacher - Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association
item.description: Bill Stauffacher signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Securities Industry and Financial Markets Association. They are a registered lobbyist.
